comments:
- Create a dynamic web project with a JSP(e.g: index.jsp)
- Creata an EAR project and add the web project to it
- Define a Websphere server in server view
- Add the EAR project to Websphere server
- Start/debug the Websphere from server view.
- Server starts up fine 
- publishing starts but fails when publishing the WAR module 
with attached error message.

  [wsadmin] com.ibm.etools.j2ee.commonarchivecore.exception.OpenFailureException: IWAE0006E Archive is not a valid WAR File because the deployment descriptor can not be found (case sensitive): WEB-INF/web.xml

(1) I checked the bugs submitted before related to Websphere EAR,
believe this is duplicated: there is no SPACE in project path...

(2) The interesting part in the error msg seems to be:

  [wsadmin] com.ibm.etools.j2ee.commonarchivecore.exception.OpenFailureException: IWAE0006E Archive is not a valid WAR File because the deployment descriptor can not be found (case sensitive): WEB-INF/web.xml

(3) If try deploy the Web project as a WAR without adding it to EAR,
the web app was able to be deployed successfully.

Foudn this is a duplicate to a bug in Generic Server publisher:
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=148901

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 148901 ***
